random.cdisc.data 0.1.2.1
  • Reference

Reference

CDISC Domain Functions

These functions generate CDISC domains containing randomly assigned data

radsl()

Subject-Level Analysis Dataset (ADSL)

radae()

Adverse Event Analysis Dataset (ADAE)

radaette()

Time to Adverse Event Analysis Dataset (ADAETTE)

radcm()

Concomitant Medication Analysis Dataset (ADCM)

radlb()

Laboratory Data Analysis Dataset (ADLB)

radqs()

Questionnaires Analysis Dataset (ADQS)

radrs()

Tumor Response Analysis Data Set (ADRS)

radtte()

Time-to-Event Analysis Dataset (ATE)

radvs()

Vital Signs Analysis Dataset (ADVS)

Utility Functions

These functions are not exported but are documented for developers

apply_metadata()

Apply label and variable ordering attributes to domains

relvar_init()

Verify and initialize related variable values

rel_var()

Assign values to a related variable within a domain

retain()

Retain values within primary keys

sample_fct()

Create a factor with random elements of x

var_relabel()

Apply labels to ADSL primary key variables

visit_schedule()

Create visit schedule

Contents

  • CDISC Domain Functions
  • Utility Functions
